summary: An obese woman recently released from an insane asylum kills anyone who attempts to get her to stop eating.
cast: Priscilla Alden|Michael Flood|Jane Lambert|Robert Copple|George 'Buck' Flower|Ginna Martine|Cliff McDonald|Charles Egan|Sonny La Rocca|Sandra Shotwell|Lisa Farros|Frances Millard
title: Criminally Insane
